pageProduct.name: U by Kotex Slim Tampons Mini 16 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

U By Kotex® Mini Tampons give you all the protection you need in a slim and comfortable design, perfect for light flow or in the last days of your period. Unlike skinny jeans 'slim' means comfortable, so that makes them so much easier to use. With last line of defence for leakage protection, they are mini in size but big on protection. Wear your favourite pair of undies without fear with U by Kotex® Tampons.

  • Leakage protection with the last line of defence
  • U BY KOTEX tampons offer period protection with oh so slender tip and slim design for easy use
  • Individually packaged with coloured twist-open wrappers
  • Perfect for your light flow days, with 8g absorbency
  • Come in handy purse packs

This product may not be right for you. Read the warning on pack before purchase and follow the instructions for use.

Suitable For: Light flow

Boxed Contents: 16 Mini Tampons

Size: 16 Pack

Warnings

Tampon use has been associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Read and keep the enclosed information. Please do not flush product or packaging. Do not flush down the toilet. Do not use if wrapper is open or damaged.

Directions

Do not flush
